text: Nostalgic...
author: FullmetalHagane

text: How does she do all that running and jumping with those...MEAT-BASKETS dragging her down?! Ah, well. Enormous boobs aside, this heroine was a total bad-ass, so I can forgive the portrayal of women here. Besides, she's much more realistic in the newest games, so...bonus points! Anyway, this song is great. 5 stars!
